about_the_game:
AreaZ game Demo is a true survival simulation, where players have to rely on their knowledge and survival skills in different bioms or so called area(z). Starting with first showcase based on beach and jungle area(z) until player conquers the deadly swamp. Future game will include Rural mainland, Forrest up to rocky and snow covered Mountains.

In order to survive, player should search closely each part of the map and each area to find and focus mainly on natural resources. Player can use a really robust crafting system to craft needed items. The nature and environment itself is made hard and will not allow player to make many mistakes. Bad decisions and resources management will lead to character starving or even death. The AreaZ game includes advanced game mechanics of natural environment, crafting, and survival and such enabling complex simulation for bold players.

Demo has limited access to first map - beach and jungle only.

content_descriptors.notes:
Game survivor character clothing might be considered as "revealing outfit".
Also there is hunting, killing and skinning of animals.
Player character might get killed by wild animals.
